channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 1:24 p.m. An alarm has been sounded in Odesa region. Stay tuned for further messages.
item.description: 🟢 1:24 p.m. An alarm has been sounded in Odesa region. Stay tuned for further messages. #Одеська_область This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟢 13:23 Alarm lifted in Donetsk region. Follow further messages.
item.description: 🟢 13:23 Alarm lifted in Donetsk region. Follow further messages. #Donetsk_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟡 13:23 Alarm lifted in Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note, the alarm is still ongoing in:- Marhanets city and Marhanets territorial community- Nikopol city and Nikopol territorial community- Chervonohryhoriv territorial community
item.description: 🟡 13:23 Alarm lifted in Dnipropetrovsk region. Please note, the alarm is still ongoing in:- Marhanets city and Marhanets territorial community- Nikopol city and Nikopol territorial community- Chervonohryhoriv territorial community#Dnipropetrovsk_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.

item.title: 🟡 13:23 Repulse of the alarm in the Kharkiv region. Please note, the alarm is still in progress in:- Kupyanskyi district- Kharkivskyi district- Lipetsk territorial community- Vovchansk territorial community
item.description: 🟡 13:23 Repulse of the alarm in the Kharkiv region. Please note, the alarm is still in progress in:- Kupyanskyi district- Kharkivskyi district- Lipetsk territorial community- Vovchansk territorial community#Харківська_область This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
